ICC's prosecutor "deeply concerned" by situation in RafahInternational Criminal Court prosecutor Karim Khan is "deeply concerned by the reported bombardment and potential ground incursion by Israeli forces in Rafah", he said on social media platform X on Monday. Mon, 12 Feb 2024 17:35:17 GMT CZJO3ZPPTVM65L3J6EL6S6ZRW4 https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/iccs-prosecutor-deeply-concerned-by-situation-rafah-2024-02-12/Reuters世界中东
Hamas armed wing says three Israeli hostages killed in Israeli airstrikesHamas' armed wing said on Monday that three of eight Israeli hostages who were seriously injured following Israeli airstrikes had died from their wounds. Mon, 12 Feb 2024 17:04:54 GMT MKGNJ5BZRJND7FMWVBFFKU67HU https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/hamas-armed-wing-says- Three-israeli-hostages-killed-israeli-airstrikes-2024-02-12/Reuters世界中东
Dutch government formation still a puzzle 12 weeks after electionEfforts to form a government in the Netherlands are back at square one 12 weeks after an election won by the nationalist Freedom Party (PVV) of anti-Muslim populist Geert Wilders but well short of a majority. Mon, 12 Feb 2024 16:58:03 GMT JSIADYAHMZNRJE25W2IJVUBK6Y https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/dutch-government-formation-still-puzzle-12-weeks-after-election-2024-02-12/Bart Meijer世界欧洲
Hundreds of baby sea turtles released off coast of Nicaragua in conservation effortNicaraguan authorities and volunteers released hundreds of tiny baby turtles on the country's Pacific coast over the weekend as part of the government's efforts to protect endangered species. Mon, 12 Feb 2024 16:39:04 GMT FHY33GJJRZPM7LZULNKVRLYTCU https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/hundreds-baby-sea-turtles-released-off-coast-nicaragua-conservation-effort-2024-02-12/Maynor Valenzuela世界美洲
Russian oligarch's seized yacht costs $7 million a year to maintain, US saysThe U.S. government said it is spending more than $7 million a year to maintain a superyacht it seized from a sanctioned Russian oligarch, and urged a judge to let it auction the vessel before a dispute over its ownership is resolved. Mon, 12 Feb 2024 16:38:17 GMT RZULL7GQ3BJ3BDMN33RSRSHO5Y https://www.reuters.com/world/ Russian-oligarchs-seized-yacht-costs-7-million-year-maintain-us-says-2024-02-12/Luc Cohen世界
Ukraine seeks action against Polish farmers for grain spillageKyiv urged Warsaw on Monday to "hold to account" Polish farmers for stopping three trucks at a border crossing between Poland and Ukraine and spilling the Ukrainian grain they were carrying. Mon, 12 Feb 2024 16:35:41 GMT BPK73GGMXNNDFP4HBYJAV4YH2Y https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/ukraine-seeks-action-over-polish-farmers-grain-spillage-2024-02-12/Reuters世界欧洲
Dutch centrist party rules out joining coalition with WildersDutch political party NSC said on Monday it would not join a new coalition government with the nationalist Freedom Party (PVV) led by anti-Muslim politician Geert Wilders, citing irreconcilable differences. Mon, 12 Feb 2024 16:16:24 GMT XGWDNOFNDNK7ZK3W5ZGCBCCFVU https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/dutch-centrist-party-rules-out-joining-coalition-with-wilders-2024-02-12/Bart Meijer世界欧洲
Serbs in northern Kosovo rally against ban on Serbian dinarThousands of Kosovo Serbs in the ethnically divided town of Mitrovica rallied peacefully on Monday to protest against the decision of Kosovo's government to outlaw the Serbian dinar as legal tender. Mon, 12 Feb 2024 16:14:33 GMT 52KTJ5M6QROB3FII75D733KDSE https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/serbs-northern-kosovo-rally-against-ban-serbian-dinar-2024-02-12/Reuters世界欧洲
Biden to meet Jordan's king, who wants Gaza ceasefireU.S. President Joe Biden will meet Jordan's King Abdullah at the White House on Monday, coming face-to-face with a longtime ally who has been vocal in calling for a Gaza ceasefire. Mon, 12 Feb 2024 16:02:38 GMT XVZ2BMAEM5KFJMHXQ4OOPIK7Q4 https://www.reuters.com/world/biden-meet-jordans-king-who-wants-gaza-ceasefire-2024-02-12/Reuters世界
Partnership with US to continue no matter who's president, German finance minister saysThe transatlantic partnership between the U.S. and European allies will continue no matter who is in the White House, Germany's finance minister said on Monday amid a furore over critical remarks about NATO by ex-U.S. President Donald Trump. Mon, 12 Feb 2024 15:29:55 GMT AFRZKNLS3ZLP5PMNZ5VCVQRQBE https://www.reuters.com/world/partnership-with-us-continue-no-matter-whos-president-german-finance-minister-2024-02-12/Reuters世界
Israeli president, Palestinian PM to attend Munich Security ConferenceIsraeli President Isaac Herzog and Palestinian Prime Minister Mohammad Shtayyeh are among hundreds of high-ranking officials due to attend the Munich Security Conference this week, its chair Christoph Heusgen said on Monday. Mon, 12 Feb 2024 15:28:08 GMT I4H5CC7AUROMXJ53XVPBVKU7QM https://www.reuters.com/world/israeli-president-palestinian-pm-attend-munich-security-conference-2024-02-12/Sarah Marsh, Andreas Rinke世界
